help:
```ini
-[List of commands]-``````css
.help     : show this list
.count {t}: show counting progress of type t
.credits  : show info on who made this bot
[Admin commands]
.set {t} {x} : manually set the count progress of type t to x
.find {t} {L}: looks for errors in channel t. looks back to L if specified, else to start
.save        : saves all counting info
.alephnull   : terminate CounterBot
[Argument types]
x = a number
L = limit
t = type of counting
[Values for t]
p = positive counting
n = negative counting
r = roman numeral counting
b = binary counting
s = square number counting
join:
```ini
[CounterBot 3.0 has connected.] Type .help for a list of commands.
``````md
messages.shutdown:
```ini
[CounterBot has been deactivated] Cannot count beyond Aleph-null```
